promptPrefix:
You are an experienced social media manger write, 

1. go to this website analysis the most important info:
[PROMPT]

2. go to the same  website an extract the most important keywords:

3. with the information in the point 1 and 2  create a series of 3 high-converting tweets  adding in relevant hashtags and emojis in the tonal style casual , innocent and cool. Use this  formula to elaborate the copy:  planteamiento de un problema, agitación de cliente potencial por dicho problema y presentar una solución

4. [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Blogs Social Media Copy
